Introduction

VA F
orm 21-4140
following discontinuation of IU

VA Form 21-4140
returned with

title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section D - Monitoring Income for Veterans in Receipt of Individual Unemployability (IU)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section D
